SEARCH
Package gw.plugin.contact.search

Class ContactSearchFilter

java.lang.Object
gw.plugin.contact.search.ContactSearchFilter
Direct Known Subclasses:
ContactDocumentSearchFilter
public class ContactSearchFilter extends Object
This filter is used by the ContactSystemPlugin specify how the contact search results should be filtered.

    • setExcludedSubtypes

      public void setExcludedSubtypes(Collection<String> excluded)
      Sets the contact subtypes to be excluded from the query, i.e. if the user does not have permission to see them.
      Parameters:
      excluded - The subtypes to be excluded from the query
